name: mature downy serviceberry tree
description: a tree with smooth, furrowed gray bark and ovate leaves with pointed tips
details: A tree grows here.  It has smooth, furrowed gray bark.  The leaves are ovate with pointed tips and finely serrated margins.
keywords: tree smooth furrowed gray bark ovate leaves pointed tips

Harvestable.preDescription: The tree is covered with small, dark blue berries.
Harvestable.postDescription: The tree has been picked clean of berries.
